title: Intel Securitys McAfee Application Control
extract: Fast, flexible, and scalable protection against zero-day and advanced persistent threats. McAfee Application Control blocks unauthorized executables on servers, corporate desktops, and fixed-function devices.
extract_html: Fast, flexible, and scalable protection against zero-day and advanced persistent threats. McAfee Application Control blocks unauthorized executables on servers, corporate desktops, and fixed-function devices.
